subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: During the past three seasons in Japan, first baseman Julio Zuleta has hit seven home runs and batted .273 against Daisuke Matsuzaka, the star pitcher who is negotiating with the Boston Red Sox.
snippet: During the past three seasons in Japan, first baseman Julio Zuleta has hit seven home runs and batted .273 against Daisuke Matsuzaka, the star pitcher who is negotiating with the Boston Red Sox.
